Title: Relates to violations of secrecy provisions of the tax law; increases penalties for disclosure of personal income information from a misdemeanor to class E felony
Summary: Relates to violations of secrecy provisions of the tax law; increases penalties for disclosure of personal income information from a misdemeanor to a class E felony.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the tax law, in relation to violations of secrecy provisions of the tax law
